title: VSO ConvertXtoDVD 5.1.0.2 Final Portable [ChingLiu]
description:
What is new?

ConvertXtoDVD - 5.1.0.2 (Released November 5th, 2013) 
- 0007216: [Information] see not responding for a couple of seconds at beginning of conversion (cedric) - resolved.

ConvertXtoDVD - 5.1.0.1
- 0007215: [Bug] Bad aspect ratio of thumbs in DVD menu with specific files (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007210: [Bug] chapter menu not editable in treeview in certain case refresh problem (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007211: [Bug] target size not respected (cedric) - resolved.
- 0006986: [Bug] Cut not working with OGG audio streams (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007208: [Bug] aspect ratio and video resize options are not being applied to files (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007209: [Bug] menu thumb not updated (cedric) - resolved.

ConvertXtoDVD - 5.1.0.0
- 0007185: [Information] FR trad missing (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007206: [Bug] dont block cxd in relation to DEP setting (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007203: [Bug] 2 pass conversion problem (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007202: [Bug] can't load file with browser window in XP (cedric) - resolved.

System Requirements

- Operating System: Windows 8/7/Vista/XP - 32 & 64 bit
- Processor Intel Pentium III / AMD Athlon (Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon XP or equivalent recommended)
- 512 MB RAM with Windows XP 
- 1 GB RAM with Windows Vista
- Hard disk drive with at least 4.3 Gbytes free
- DVD Burner

Languages : English, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, German, Arabic and more.

Homepage :  <a href="
http://www.vso-software.fr/products/convert_x_to_dvd/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.vso-software.fr/products/convert_x_to_dvd/</a>
